※The items offered in this pack can be purchased as a single item. Refunds will not be offered for duplicate purchase.

THE COLLISION IS INEVITABLE! THE IMPACT WILL BE UNAVOIDABLE!

An unrivaled clash of explosive proportions! The beloved BlazBlue franchise Crosses universes
column25: and Battles it out in BLAZBLUE CROSS TAG BATTLE! Created through an all-star collaboration between BlazBlue
column28: and Rooster Teeth’s hugely popular RWBY web series
column29: Cross Tag Battle celebrates the fighting genre for pros and newcomers alike! Choose your team in fast paced 2v2 team battles filled with the craziness you’ve come to love from BlazBlue
column32:
and gorgeous 2D graphics you expect from Arc System Works.

BlazBlue
column33: celebrating 10 years of fighting game excellence in 2018
column34: is a series long beloved by the fighting game community for its deep and engrossing story
column35: its vast cast of balanced characters
column36:
and its quick and kinetic gameplay style.
Atlus’ Persona series
column37: a worldwide RPG phenomenon and no stranger to the fighting game genre itself. Persona characters have appeared in Arc System Works games before
column38:
notable Persona 4 Arena and Persona 4 Arena Ultimax.
Under Night In-Birth is veteran fighting game developer French Bread’s first foray into an original title
column39:
coming hot off the heels of their success with the cult classic series Melty Blood.
Rooster Teeth’s animated mega hit
column41: has been a popular franchise for years
column42:
crossing both gender and age barriers to become a mainstream hit. Characters from the RWBY series have never appeared in a fighting game before. Until now.

This edition contains Additional 20 Characters All-in-One Pack. *Additional characters are available after release.
